name: Fairy Meadow
description:
Fairy Meadow is a simple and sweet game where you take on a role of a woodland sprite. Animals come to your meadow for a small snack, but can't pick them by themselves and need your help. See how good you are in at quickly giving each animal the kind of food it likes!

Take your chances in a cute, small, arcade gameplay and see if you can beat your top score!

Game features:
  • Nice, lively mood.
  • Cute animals! Discover what each of it wants to eat!
  • Quick gameplay with simple rules.
Controls: Mouse and Left Click
Use menus
WSAD or Arrow Keys
Move around
SPACEJump/fly up
ESCPause game

Have fun!
